message.name: ERR_AUTOSCHEDULE_XRV_NOTFOUND
message.locale: No suitable availability could be determined.

message.name: ERR_AUTOSCHEDULE_FV_STARTDATE_PAST
message.locale: The start date must not be in the past.

message.name: ERR_AUTOSCHEDULE_FV_STARTDATE_MISSING
message.locale: The start date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_AUTOSCHEDULE_FV_HEARINGID_CASEID
message.locale: Either the hearing or the appeal case must be specified.
